mapper.insert: insert into emp (username, name, gender, image, job, entrydate, dept_id, create_time, update_time) values (#{username}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{image}, #{job}, #{entryDate}, #{deptId}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.update: update emp set username = #{username}, name = #{name}, gender = #{gender}, image = #{image}, job = #{job}, entrydate = #{entryDate}, dept_id = #{deptId}, update_time = #{updateTime} where id = #{id}
